task.title: Production Environment Issues
task.shortdesc: To work on a production environment issue, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Upon discovery of the issue, notify the IT Director and Program Manager.
Network Operations (or Development Team, depending on issue) coordinates resolution and communicates status to IT Director and Program Manager.
The Development Team will coordinate resolution and deploy a hot fix to Staging. The fix will be applied to source, as well as release, if one is in progress
IT Director or Program Manager notifiy Client business and/or complete an Incident Report as required.
